verses.arabic: قُلۡ أُوحِیَ إِلَیَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبࣰا
verses.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.
verses.transliteration: Qul oohiya ilaiya annna hustama'a nafarum minal jinnni faqaalooo innaa sami'naa quraanan 'ajabaa

verses.arabic: یَهۡدِیۤ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَاۤ أَحَدࣰا
verses.translation: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.
verses.transliteration: Yahdeee ilar rushdi fa aamannaa bihee wa lan nushrika bi rabbinaaa ahadaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةࣰ وَلَا وَلَدࣰا
verses.translation: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
verses.transliteration: Wa annahoo Ta'aalaa jaddu Rabbinaa mat takhaza saahibatanw wa la waladaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ یَقُولُ سَفِیهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطࣰا
verses.translation: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.
verses.transliteration: Wa annahoo kaana yaqoolu safeehunaa 'alal laahi shatataa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّاۤ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبࣰا
verses.translation: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan taqoolal insu wal jinnu 'alal laahi kazibaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ یَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالࣲ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقࣰا
verses.translation: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.
verses.transliteration: Wa annahoo kaana rijaa lum minal insi ya'oozoona birijaalim minal jinni fazaa doohum rahaqaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن یَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدࣰا
verses.translation: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].
verses.transliteration: Wa annahum zannoo kamaa zanantum al lany yab'asal laahu ahadaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ فَوَجَدۡنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسࣰا شَدِیدࣰا وَشُهُبࣰا
verses.translation: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa lamasnas sa maaa'a fa wajadnaahaa muli'at harasan shadeedanw wa shuhubaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن یَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡـَٔانَ یَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابࣰا رَّصَدࣰا
verses.translation: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa kunnaa naq'udu minhaa maqaa'ida lis'sam'i famany yastami'il aana yajid lahoo shihaabar rasada

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِیۤ أَشَرٌّ أُرِیدَ بِمَن فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدࣰا
verses.translation: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa laa nadreee asharrun ureeda biman fil ardi am araada bihim rabbuhum rashadaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَاۤىِٕقَ قِدَدࣰا
verses.translation: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa minnas saalihoona wa minnaa doona zaalika kunnaa taraaa'ilqa qidadaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّاۤ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبࣰا
verses.translation: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa zanannaaa al lan nu'jizal laaha fil ardi wa lan nu'jizahoo harabaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰۤ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن یُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا یَخَافُ بَخۡسࣰا وَلَا رَهَقࣰا
verses.translation: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa lammaa sami'nal hudaaa aamannaa bihee famany yu'mim bi rabbihee falaa yakhaafu bakhsanw wa laa rahaqaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَـٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ تَحَرَّوۡا۟ رَشَدࣰا
verses.translation: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.
verses.transliteration: Wa annaa minnal muslimoona wa minnal qaasitoona faman aslama fa ulaaa'ika taharraw rashadaa

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبࣰا
verses.translation: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'
verses.transliteration: Wa ammal qaasitoona fa kaanoo li jahannama hatabaa

verses.arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِیقَةِ لَأَسۡقَیۡنَـٰهُم مَّاۤءً غَدَقࣰا
verses.translation: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
verses.transliteration: Wa alla wis taqaamoo 'alat tareeqati la asqaynaahum maa'an ghadaqaa

verses.arabic: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِیهِۚ وَمَن یُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ یَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابࣰا صَعَدࣰا
verses.translation: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.
verses.transliteration: Linaftinahum feeh; wa many yu'rid 'an zikri rabbihee yasluk hu 'azaaban sa'adaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدࣰا
verses.translation: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.
verses.transliteration: Wa annal masaajida lillaahi falaa tad'oo ma'al laahi ahadaa

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ یَدۡعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ یَكُونُونَ عَلَیۡهِ لِبَدࣰا
verses.translation: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."
verses.transliteration: Wa annahoo lammaa qaama 'adul laahi yad'oohu kaadoo yakoonoona 'alaihi libadaa

verses.arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَاۤ أَدۡعُوا۟ رَبِّی وَلَاۤ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦۤ أَحَدࣰا
verses.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
verses.transliteration: Qul innamaaa ad'oo rabbee wa laaa ushriku biheee ahadaa

verses.arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّی لَاۤ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرࣰّا وَلَا رَشَدࣰا
verses.translation: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."
verses.transliteration: Qul innee laaa amliku lakum darranw wa laa rashadaa

verses.arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّی لَن یُجِیرَنِی مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدࣱ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
verses.transliteration: Qul innee lany yujeeranee minal laahi ahad, wa lan ajida min doonihee multahadaa

verses.arabic: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغࣰا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن یَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدًا
verses.translation: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
verses.transliteration: Illaa balaagham minal laahi wa risaalaatih; wa many ya'sil laaha wa rasoolahoo fa inna lahoo naara jahannama khaalideena feehaaa abadaa

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰۤ إِذَا رَأَوۡا۟ مَا یُوعَدُونَ فَسَیَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرࣰا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدࣰا
verses.translation: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
verses.transliteration: Hattaaa izaa ra aw maa yoo'adoona fasaya'lamoona man ad'afu naasiranw wa aqallu 'adadaa

verses.arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِیۤ أَقَرِیبࣱ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ یَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّیۤ أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
verses.transliteration: Qul in adreee a qareebum maa too'adoona am yaj'alu lahoo rabbeee amadaa

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ فَلَا یُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَیۡبِهِۦۤ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
verses.transliteration: 'Aalimul ghaibi falaa yuzhiru alaa ghaibiheee ahadaa

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولࣲ فَإِنَّهُۥ یَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَیۡنِ یَدَیۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدࣰا
verses.translation: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
verses.transliteration: Illaa manir tadaa mir rasoolin fa innahoo yasluku mim baini yadihi wa min khalfihee rasadaa

verses.arabic: لِّیَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَیۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَیۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
verses.translation: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
verses.transliteration: Liya'lama an qad ablaghoo risaalaati rabbihim wa ahaata bima ladihim wa ahsaa kulla shai'in 'adadaa
